verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H1954>Hosea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H882>Beeri,<s%> during the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah,<s%> <S%H3147>Jotham,<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz,<s%> [and] <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and during the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3060>Joash,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

When the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8462>first<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> through <S%H1954>Hosea,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1954>Hosea,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> to yourself a <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H2183>harlotry,<s%> and [have] <S%H3206>children<s%> of <S%H2183>harlotry;<s%> for the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2181>commits<s%> <S%H2181>flagrant<s%> <S%H2181>harlotry,<s%> <S%H4480>forsaking<s%> <S%H310><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"
So he <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1586>Gomer<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1691>Diblaim,<s%> and she <S%H2029>conceived<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> him a <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H7121>"Name<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H3157>Jezreel;<s%> for <S%H5750>yet<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4592>while,<s%> and I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> for the <S%H1818>bloodshed<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> and I will <S%H7673>put<s%> an <S%H7673>end<s%> to the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>"

Then she <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> and <S%H3205>gave<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to a <S%H1323>daughter.<s%> And the Lord <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H7121>"Name<s%> <S%H8034><s%> her Lo-ruhamah, for I will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>longer<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that I should <S%H5375>ever<s%> <S%H5375>forgive<s%> them.

"But I will <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3467>deliver<s%> them by the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and will not <S%H3467>deliver<s%> them by <S%H7198>bow,<s%> <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H4421>battle,<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> or <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>"
When she had <S%H1580>weaned<s%> Lo-ruhamah, she <S%H2029>conceived<s%> and <S%H3205>gave<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to a <S%H1121>son.<s%>
And the Lord <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121>"Name<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Lo-ammi, for you are not My <S%H5971>people<s%> and I am not your God."

Yet the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> Will be like the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H4058>measured<s%> or <S%H5608>numbered;<s%> And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about that, in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>Where<s%> it is <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "You are not My <S%H5971>people,<s%>" It will be <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "[You are] the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>"

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will be <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H9191>together,<s%> And they will <S%H7760>appoint<s%> for themselves <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7218>leader,<s%> And they will <S%H5927>go<s%> up from the <S%H776>land,<s%> For <S%H1419>great<s%> will be the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>
